definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: Aquatic resources along the coast of South America.
Distributing all over the world intertropical , the selva area with South America is most.
sentences.chinese: 分布在全世界的热带，以南美洲的热带雨林地区最多。

sentences.english: Cocona fruit is another tropical fruit found in the mountainous regions of South America.
sentences.chinese: 可可果是在南美洲山区发现的别一种热带水果。

sentences.english: In South America, a weedy corn relative, teosinte, dresses the edges of domesticated cornfields.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲的玉米田周围，长着它们的野生亲戚，蜀黍。

sentences.english: At the southern end of South America lies the jewel of Patagonia.
sentences.chinese: 南美洲南端的巴塔哥尼亚嵌上了宝石一样。

sentences.english: It's called la conga which is one of the most popular dances in South America.
sentences.chinese: 这叫做康茄舞，这种舞是在南美洲最流行的一种。

sentences.english: The Federative Republic of Brazil is the largest country in South America.
sentences.chinese: 巴西联邦共和国是南美洲最大的国家。

sentences.english: Red fire ants like these in the American south have gotten a bad rap in our world.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，南美洲出现的这种红火蚁已经是声名狼藉。

sentences.english: They came to Tierra del Fuego at the tip of South America.
sentences.chinese: 他们又去了南美洲南端的火地岛。

sentences.english: They discovered a lot of silver down in South America, started bringing back to Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他们在南美洲发现了大量的银子，并把它们带回欧洲。

sentences.english: For the green anaconda, the hunting tools are the same.
sentences.chinese: 绿色的南美洲水蟒也有相同的捕食工具。

sentences.english: The station in South America will be set up in 2016, Qian said.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲站将设于2016年，钱其琛说。

sentences.english: One type of Acacia tree in South America encourages ants to live in it.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲有一种阿拉伯胶树会让蚂蚁住在里面。

sentences.english: In South America, live anaconda and boa constrictor.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲，活蟒蛇和蟒蛇。

sentences.english: The Tamarin live in South America, a region once wildly raised by Indians.
sentences.chinese: 绒猴生活在南美洲，曾被印第安人饲养。

sentences.english: A mutiny have take place off the coast of south america.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲海岸外的舰艇上发生了一次哗变。

definition: America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Andes mountain chain of South America
